actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to provide for a review of a decision concerning a construction grant for the Ypsilanti Wastewater Treatment Plant in Washtenaw County, Michigan.
subjects: Federal aid to water pollution control

summary.text: Requires the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to direct the Assistant Administrator for Water to grant the petition submitted on May 31, 1996, on behalf of Washtenaw County, Michigan, for review of a decision by the Regional Administrator concerning a construction grant for the Ypsilanti Wastewater Treatment Plant.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to provide for a review of a decision concerning a construction grant for the Ypsilanti Wastewater Treatment Plant in Washtenaw County, Michigan.
